message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm confident in the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  I believe that's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm still a bit above my target budget, but I really think this product could be a great value for me. Can we meet in the middle again?
